description: Number of orderings of the subsets of a set with n elements that are compatible with the subsets' sizes; i.e. if A, B are two subsets with A<=B then Card(A)<=Card(B).
comments: a(7) has 127 digits and too large to include in sequence. - _Ray Chandler_, Nov 22 2003
author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 15 2003
